# CLDV7112w Practicum - Real-Time Data Processing System

This workspace is designed for the Cloud Development B practicum, focusing on building a scalable real-time data processing system for an e-commerce platform using Azure services.

## Project Overview
- **Module**: CLDV7112w Cloud Development B
- **Assessment**: Practicum (100 marks)
- **Focus**: Real-time data processing system for e-commerce platform
- **Azure Services**: App Service, Azure Functions, Azure SQL Database, Event Hubs, Autoscaling

## Required Components
1. Azure App Service for hosting the application
2. Azure SQL Database for data storage
3. Azure Event Hubs for real-time data ingestion
4. Azure Functions for data processing pipeline
5. Autoscaling configuration for both App Service and Functions
6. Load testing and performance monitoring
7. Comprehensive documentation with screenshots

## Development Guidelines
- Use good programming practices and code comments
- Save all project files in this workspace
- Include infrastructure as code (ARM templates/Bicep)
- Create comprehensive documentation
- Test scalability with simulated heavy loads
- Monitor performance during peak loads

## Submission Requirements
- Single MS-Word document with screenshots and descriptions
- URL format: http://student_number.azurewebsites.net
- Repository link with source code
- Theory question answers
